name: Heartbroken Crocodile
description:
Heartbroken Crocodile is a game about love, a broken hearted crocodile and micro surgery.

It was devedloped for the Science Jam 2021 during the International Science Festival of Gothenburg.
https://vetenskapsfestivalen.se/hem/

Credits

  • Johan Handin - 3D Artist johanhandin.com
  • Emelie Bergman - Artist
  • Manuela Q. Ramos - System & Game Devlopment
  • Erik Einebrant - Development, Design & Tech Artist

Inspired by the research of Michael Axelsson

Sound effects

  • Steady Heart Monitor To Flatline Unhissed (modified) by Benboncan
    https://freesound.org/people/Benboncan/sounds/63832/
  • Shopping cart moving by enric592
    https://freesound.org/people/enric592/sounds/185747/

Music

  • Broken Heart (modified) by Matt Simmonds
    https://freemusicarchive.org/music/4mat#contact-artist
  • Anti-Focus by Miquel Parera
    https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Miquel_Parera
